text: mariyu varu ninnu strila rtukalam gurinci adugutunnaru. Nivu variki ila telupu: "Adoka aparisud'dha (hanikaramaina) sthiti. Kanuka rtukalanlo strilato (sambhoganiki) duranga undandi. Varu parisud'dhulu kananta varaku vari vaddaku pokandi. Varu parisud'dhulu ayina taruvata allah adesincina cotu nundi miru vari vaddaku povaccu. Niscayanga, allah pascattapa padevarini premistadu mariyu parisud'dhuluga undevarini premistadu
